body:
@peng-yongsheng 

I have done
1. Relocate the @ScopeDeclaration annotation, make it more sense. Also remove the useless @SourceType annotation. And adjust the document for these changes
2. ScopeDeclaration can be used once for each class only, now.

i run it in a docker linux, it appeares again，@[peng-yongsheng](/peng-yongsheng)
The error could happen, but may not a bug. If you set cluster mode incorrect, you could get this error.

Deploy new 6.x backend cluster. Every time you reboot agent with application, change it pointing to new backend. Once all reboot done, the new 6.x is on line.

This is a very common way to do Blue-green release process.

@wu-sheng It’s really exciting. I added the scope and oal scripts for clr metrics, and generated the database tables as expected. https://github.com/liuhaoyang/incubator-skywalking/commit/483937ee52ec6d433638216c05bbd3b5e7c493de

Here is the [test report](http://github.com/SkywalkingTest/agent-integration-test-report/tree/master/2019/2/apache/testReport-master-2019-02-25-23-48.md) and [validate logs](http://35.227.88.23:49001/job/skywalking-agent-automated-testing/338/artifact/skywalking-agent-testcases/workspace/logs/validate-2019-02-25-23-48.log)

> I suggest that the mysql 6.x plugin is a new plugins. those code about mysql 6.x plugin should be move into new project

Yes. I think we should make plugins for 5, 6 and 8 clearer. @dsc6636926 Could you help on that?
good, i will do
Image has moved to ASF. You can't get the skywalking org.
@hanahmily do we have fixed this in master?
Should we change docker-compose?
Yes. If master branch hasn't changed, could you send a pull request to fix this?

Thank you. Let me try.
/assign @xichengliudui
the docker folder in main project is a convenient  way to test source code in docker. So user should issue `make build` to build image before running `docker-compose up`
@hanahmily Which directory should I go to?
docker/

```
[root@localhost docker]# clear
[root@localhost docker]# make build
cd /home/liudui/incubator-skywalking/docker/oap; \
cp ../../dist/apache-skywalking-apm-incubating-bin.tar.gz ./ ; \
docker build -t skywalking/oap:latest .
cp: cannot stat ‘../../dist/apache-skywalking-apm-incubating-bin.tar.gz’: No such file or directory
Sending build context to Docker daemon   7.68kB
Step 1/9 : FROM openjdk:8u181-jdk-stretch

Step 3/9 : COPY "$DIST_NAME.tar.gz" /

make: *** [oap] Error 1
```
Can you provide a link to this file? Thank you very much
Could you do that by a standard log4j formater? We recommend you do like other application toolkit did.

In the root folder of the project, issue `./mvnw install` to generate `/dist/apache-skywalking-apm-incubating-bin.tar.gz`. 
Or you can use official docker image `apache/skywalking-oap-server` instead of building project.
and `apache/skywalking-ui`
Ok, I try it.
As we are going to discuss the TLP graduation, open this again. We are going to try this again.
This mean your collector doesn't start up right.
+1 Great job!
congrats
+1 great job.
great job
we are waiting for this job! ^-^
+1 great job.
+1 great job!
+1 great job!

In the incubator, we have
1. 65 open users, https://github.com/apache/incubator-skywalking/blob/master/docs/powered-by.md
2. 9 committers, 3 PPMC selected from the nearly 100 contributors(94 in main repo at this moment).
3. 8 releases passed. 5 to 5-GA, 3 to 6-GA.
so is there detailed instructions for version 6.0 quickly startup, we use ES6 as the storage, what could be the highest possible problem we meet
Quick startup is provided in document, only use H2 as storage.
greeting
thanks for giving us so good apm choice, good job.
thanks for wu-sheng ，Powerful support

This could be caused by you didn't reboot applciation(agent), but delete the ElasticSearch.

gRPCPort

how to resolve this problem?
all right i think our configuration is correct now but webUI still continue pops up error banners, we configure the core.default to our own configs, and point agent to connect gRPC host port..
+1 great job!
Check your storage, es maybe? Does it have data already? You need to check your oap log, to see what is happening.

it works now! thank you very much for your patience, dude

This is not SkyWalking main repo issue.
I think it should work in Tomcat. It has no difference with other plugins. They all should work in Tomcat. No classloader issue in default Tomcat.

> I think it should work in Tomcat. It has no difference with other plugins. They all should work in Tomcat. No classloader issue in default Tomcat.

You mean put  apm-spring-annotation-plugin-6.0.0-GA.jar in TOMCAT_PATH/webapps/APPLICATION/WEB-INF/lib  will work as put it in AGENT_PATH/plugins ?

> I think it should work in Tomcat. It has no difference with other plugins. They all should work in Tomcat. No classloader issue in default Tomcat.

Put  apm-spring-annotation-plugin-6.0.0-GA.jar to TOMCAT_PATH/bin works.
I think AgentClassLoader's parent is AppClassLoader, and it's class path is TOMCAT_PATH/bin.
Thanks for your reply.
In my mind, in AGENT_PATH/plugins should work too.

> In my mind, in AGENT_PATH/plugins should work too.

Yes
Read oal script and document, you could do by yourself.
We have timer to delete. If don't work well, you could try to find the bug
What status of #2298 ？

> What status of #2298 ？

The kernel code is this, but I did not finish the testcase writing, can I use the version version of springboot to indirectly test the compatibility of SpEL?
What do you mean using version of spring?

@dio I changed your branch directly to do following adjustments
1. Remove `google/protobuf/*.proto` which already included in skywalking
1. Sync `gogoproto/gogo.proto` from Istio. Integrate two version will trigger runtime issue.
1. Adjust maven to make Apache rat works
1. Add license(s) to root LICENSE file, because we copied proto files from other projects, and will include them in Apache source release.
Look like, this includes #2298 codes already.
yes
@dsc6636926 Any update?

> @dsc6636926 Any update?

everything is done but still have some problems on mysql-5.x for record all connectionUrls,on 5.x every connectionImpl have it's own connUrl,rawUrl will be removed,so i can only get single url, if interceptor the method ReplicationConnectionProxy.createProxyInstance to wrap the connection,there are still some error when commit or close the connection,because these operactions are processed by single connection,single connection can only contains it's own connectionUrl, I am thinking about how to resolve the problem.
If there is conflict, you could use witness class, to make different versions work. You don't need to provide codes to work in multiple version, that is not reality.

> If there is conflict, you could use witness class, to make different versions work. You don't need to provide codes to work in multiple version, that is not reality.

the problem is appeared on multipleHost mode only for 5.x version,
when on multipleHost mode , I have some problem to get all peer IPs. so I am thinking about it for a long time. i think on the same version i cannot find any conflict class for witness unless create a new class dynamic,but it seems not a good idea

I noticed https://github.com/apache/incubator-skywalking-ui/pull/236 . Why do you need to change query in this implicit? This is bad for integration. 

We have another UI, RocketBot, we are discussing to accept it as primary UI. This change could break it.
cc @TinyAllen
If query protocol needs to be changed, it must be changed in protocol level.
Daily index queries need time to determine which index to route to, but the TraceQueryService. queryTrace (String traceId) method has no timestamp

> the problem is appeared on multipleHost mode only for 5.x version,
when on multipleHost mode , I have some problem to get all peer IPs. so I am thinking about it for a long time. i think on the same version i cannot find any conflict class for witness unless create a new class dynamic,but it seems not a good idea

If you are in a particular instrumentation case, you could
1. Cache the IPs from settings, then read it when they are needed, by building a static cache, with Datasource or some object as key
1. Cache the IP in the dynamic field, we created, and propagate it from the beginning.
cc @peng-yongsheng Welcome to join this review. I think you mentioned someone else has a segment index change too.

> > the problem is appeared on multipleHost mode only for 5.x version,
> > when on multipleHost mode , I have some problem to get all peer IPs. so I am thinking about it for a long time. i think on the same version i cannot find any conflict class for witness unless create a new class dynamic,but it seems not a good idea
> 
> If you are in a particular instrumentation case, you could
> 
> 1. Cache the IPs from settings, then read it when they are needed, by building a static cache, with Datasource or some object as key
> 2. Cache the IP in the dynamic field, we created, and propagate it from the beginning.

thank you,i think i should use first method,because in this case when i can get the multiple urls from the beginning,the connection EnhancedInstance is not readable,so i cannot cache the urls in each connection instance (this is why i think so long ,because i still think cache ips in the dynamic field is more comfortable then use static cache). with your suggest i will try the first suggestion to make it work well first.
Yes, dynamic field is better than static field.
It doesn't release yet. From I known, that is based on time duration of whole page. No difference. Also, it is affected by record ttl, so could be deleted because you set ttl short for segment.
where I can set ttl ?
application.yml in config. You should know, this could make you storage huge data, if you set ttl long.
is recordDataTTL?from application.yml I see it is 90 minute
Yes. Should be.
thank you,I've verify it's really this palce
done

here?
https://github.com/SkyAPMTest/agent-auto-integration-testcases/tree/master/mysql-scenario

Yes. Please follow the documents if you need to add new case.

You need to make sure the tests passed, before merge this, besides review codes

> 
> You need to make sure the tests passed, before merge this, besides review codes
